properties.entry: SELECT NVL(SUM(PRICE),0) salesRate FROM PRODUCT JOIN TRADE USING(PRODUCT_NO)
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) tstockgoods FROM PRODUCT WHERE UPLOAD_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD')
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) reportedproduct FROM (SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT_NO FROM PRODUCT JOIN REPORT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE REPORT_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD'))
